scripts.token-transform-light: npx token-transformer src/data/figma-tokens.json src/data/build/light.json global,light,theme global
scripts.token-transform-dark: npx token-transformer src/data/figma-tokens.json src/data/build/dark.json global,dark,theme global
scripts.transform-tokens: npm run token-transform-global && npm run token-transform-dark && npm run token-transform-light
scripts.build-tokens: npm run transform-tokens && npm run generate-tokens
scripts.build: npm run build-tokens && tsup src/index.ts --format esm,cjs --dts
